TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BufferedReadStream extends System.IO.Stream

Docs.summary: A Stream that wraps another stream and allows reading lines. The data is buffered in memory.

public: System::String ^ ReadLine(int lengthLimit);

.method public hidebysig instance string ReadLine(int32 lengthLimit) cil managed
Public Function ReadLine (lengthLimit As Integer) As String
member this.ReadLine : int -> string

Docs.summary: Reads a line. A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed. The resulting string does not contain the terminating carriage return and line feed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::String ^> ^ ReadLineAsync(int lengthLimit, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);

Docs.summary: Reads a line. A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed. The resulting string does not contain the terminating carriage return and line feed.
